document_data.name: Morghal
document_data.mainbody: '''Morghal'''  was a [[duergar]] slaver and a cleric of [[Laduguer]] who took up residence in [[Grymforge]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: She had dark-gray skin and wore [[leather armor]].
document_data.Relationships: She hated [[True Soul]] [[Nere]], one of the lesser lieutenants in the [[Cult of the Absolute]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Morghal and her fellow slavers from the [[Clan Flameshade]] aligned themselves with the Cult of the Absolute, as the cultists began to excavate the fortress of [[Grymforge]], with the hope of uncovering the [[Admantine Forge]]. She and her cultists raided [[myconid]] and [[deep gnome]] communities for slave labor, but were not promptly paid for their efforts by Nere.
